rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that doubles as a living area for social gatherings, incorporating natural lighting with large windows. Vastu principles are followed by orienting the main entrance in the auspicious direction (East).
A dedicated dining room adjacent to the kitchen, designed for family meals and gatherings. The layout is aligned with Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Modern kitchen equipped with all necessary amenities. Adjacent service area includes storage, dishwasher, and a small pantry.
A private master bedroom with attached bathroom. Vastu alignment is ensured by positioning the bed away from windows to avoid sleep disturbances.
Two additional bedrooms for children or guests. Placed in areas that minimize noise and maximize privacy, following Vastu recommendations.
A dedicated space for the servants including a small bedroom and attached bathroom, ensuring separation from main living areas while maintaining proximity for convenience.
An entertainment area equipped with audiovisual technology. Soundproofed walls are included to enhance acoustics and privacy as per design requirements.
A compact gymnasium featuring essential workout equipment, designed for personal fitness routines. Placed away from bedrooms to ensure peace during sleep hours.

openings.description: Primary access door designed for easy entry while following Vastu by aligning with the auspicious east direction.
Strategically placed windows to enhance natural ventilation and lighting, respecting local climate conditions.
Small balcony providing outdoor space for relaxation and maintaining indoor air quality.
